CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL( amc__Billing_Type__c , "Fixed Price") ,amc__Cost_Budget__c - ( amc__Hours_Completed_Value_Cost__c + amc__Hours_Remaining_Value_Cost__c + IF(amc__Actual_Project_Expenses__c > amc__Anticipated_Project_Expenses__c, amc__Actual_Project_Expenses__c, amc__Anticipated_Project_Expenses__c) + amc__Expense_Summary__c + amc__Material_Costs_Remaining__c), IF(ISPICKVAL(amc__Billing_Type__c, "Fixed Price + Expenses"), (amc__Cost_Budget__c + IF(amc__Actual_Project_Expenses_Billable__c > amc__Anticipated_Project_Expenses__c, amc__Actual_Project_Expenses_Billable__c, amc__Anticipated_Project_Expenses__c)) - (amc__Hours_Completed_Value_Cost__c + amc__Hours_Remaining_Value_Cost__c + IF(amc__Actual_Project_Expenses__c > amc__Anticipated_Project_Expenses__c, amc__Actual_Project_Expenses__c, amc__Anticipated_Project_Expenses__c) + amc__Expense_Summary__c + amc__Material_Costs_Remaining__c) , ( amc__Hours_Completed_Cost__c + amc__Hours_Remaining_Cost__c + IF(amc__Actual_Project_Expenses_Billable__c > amc__Anticipated_Project_Expenses__c, amc__Actual_Project_Expenses_Billable__c, amc__Anticipated_Project_Expenses__c) + amc__Material_Costs_Scheduled__c) - ( amc__Hours_Completed_Value_Cost__c + amc__Hours_Remaining_Value_Cost__c + IF(amc__Actual_Project_Expenses__c > amc__Anticipated_Project_Expenses__c, amc__Actual_Project_Expenses__c, amc__Anticipated_Project_Expenses__c) + amc__Expense_Summary__c + amc__Material_Costs_Remaining__c)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Identifies the P&L for the Project based on the Forecast figures (Completed + Remaining). If Fixed Price use Project Budget, otherwise Completed & Remaining Billable - Completed & Billable Costs plus Actual or Anticipated Expenses, whichever is greater
CustomField.label: P&L (Forecast)
